rukus.text: 2|8|aur[1] kuchh log kahate hain ki ham allaah tatha aakhirat (paralok) par eemaan le aaye, jabaki ve eemaan nahin rakhate.
2|9|ve allaah tatha jo eemaan laaye, unhen dhokha dete hain. jabaki ve svayan apane-aap ko dhokha dete hain, parantu ve ise samajhate nahin.
2|10|unake dilon mein rog (duvidha) hai, jise allaah ne aur adhik kar diya aur unake lie jhooth bolane ke kaaran dukhadaayee yaatana hai.
2|11|aur jab unase kaha jaata hai ki dharatee mein upadrav na karo, to kahate hain ki ham to keval sudhaar karane vaale hain.
2|12|saavadhaan! vahee log upadravee hain, parantu unhen isaka bodh nahin.

2|13|aur[1] jab unase kaha jaata hai ki jaise aur log eemaan laaye, tumabhee eemaan lao, to kahate hain ki kya moorkhon ke samaan hamabhee vishvaas kar len? saavadhaan! vahee moorkh hain, parantu ve jaanate nahin.

2|14|tatha jab ve eemaan vaalon se milate hain, to kahate hain ki ham eemaan laaye aur jab akele mein apane shaitaanon (pramukhon) ke saath hote hain, to kahate hain ki ham tumhaare saath hain. ham to maatr parihaas kar rahe hain.
2|15|allaah unase parihaas kar raha hai tatha unhen, unake kukarmon mein bahakane ka avasar de raha hai.
2|16|ye ve log hain, jinhonne seedhee dagar (supath) ke badale gumaraahee (kupath) khareed lee. parantu unake vyaapaar mein laabh nahin hua aur na unhonne seedhee dagar paayee.

2|17|unakee[1] dasha unake jaisee hai, jinhonne agni sulagaayee aur jab unake aas-paas ujaala ho gaya, to allaah ne unaka ujaala chheen liya tatha unhen aise andheron mein chhod diya, jinamen unhen kuchh dikhaee nahin deta.
2|18|ve goonge, bahare, andhe hain. atah ab ve lautane vaale nahin.

2|19|athava[1] (unakee dasha) aakaash kee varsha ke samaan hai, jisamen andhere aur kadak tatha viddhut ho, ve kadak ke kaaran, mrtyu ke bhay se, apane kaanon mein ungaliyaan daal lete hain aur allaah, kaafiron ko apane niyantran mein lie hue hai.

2|20|viddhut unakee aankhon ko uchak lene ke sameep ho jaatee hai. jab unake lie chamakatee hai, to usake ujaale mein chalane lagate hain aur jab andhera ho jaata hai, to khade ho jaate hain aur yadi allaah chaahe, to unake kaanon ko bahara aur unakee aankhon ka andha kar de. nishchay allaah jo chaahe, kar sakata hai.
